column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to acquire a legendary weapon.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to train as a warrior or mage.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] completes training in a job class.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to become more experienced in [This.GetHerHis] chosen class.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has been promoted to the next level in [This.GetHerHis] class.
If [This.GetTitledFirstName] promotes at Level §Y20§!, all stats will increase by §Y1§!.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to gather a large amount of quintessence - the magical energy behind all living things.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered all the quintessence [This.GetSheHe] desires.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will be able to take new actions based on the amount of quintessence collected.
